trans-unit.source: Represents the converter that converts Boolean values to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Representa o conversor que converte valores boolianos para e de <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Use the BooleanToVisibilityConverter class to convert a Boolean to and from a <xref:System.Windows.Visibility> value.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe BooleanToVisibilityConverter para converter um valor booleano para e de um <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.Convert%2A> method returns <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName> when `true` is passed in or <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName> when `false` is passed in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.Convert%2A>método retorna <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName>quando `true` é passado ou <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName>quando `false` foi passado.</xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.Convert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName> value hides the control and does not reserve space for it in a layout.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName>oculta o controle de valor e não reserva espaço para ele em um layout.</xref:System.Windows.Visibility?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack%2A> method and specify a reference to an object, it returns `true` if the object is <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>; otherwise, it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack%2A>método e especifique uma referência a um objeto, ele retorna `true` se o objeto for <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>; caso contrário, ele retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Visibility> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BooleanToVisibilityConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Converts a Boolean value to a <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Converte um valor booliano para um <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: This value can be a standard Boolean value or a nullable Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor pode ser um valor booliano padrão ou um valor booliano permite valor nulo.

trans-unit.source: if value is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if value is ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> enumeration value to a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> valor de enumeração como um valor booliano.

trans-unit.source: if value is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if value is ; otherwise, .
